title: Fazenda (Canon Manuel Esteves)
body: He was a native of the city of Covilhã and passed away in Lisbon on March 13, 1903, at the age of 58. In 1899, he was presented as a canon of the Funchal Cathedral and distinguished himself as a politician and journalist in this city, where he served in various political commissions.

Canon Manuel Esteves: Politician, journalist, and canon of the Funchal Cathedral

1899: Year in which he was presented as a canon of the Funchal Cathedral
